participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and engaged, Lena is passionate about social issues and the environment.
participant_1.background: i have solar panels on my roof. i buy only organic food products. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i love social media especially twitter. i am a feminist.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Friendly and family-oriented, Mark enjoys outdoor activities and values relaxation through reading.
participant_2.background: i walk three miles every day. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love to spend time with my family. i am a baby delivery nurse.

content.text: i do not have any hobbies .
i'm fine , thank you . i am a little conservative , but i am not very good at it .
and what are you good at?
i am a little outdoors , but i do not have a lot of time to do .
and what do you do outdoors?
i love to garden . i love to garden .
i like to do outdoor activities .
